description.raw:
As a follow-up to pull request #504, I'm using the python version detection script more widely, in the Linux jobs in this pull request and for homebrew in the next one. In addition, I made the following changes:

1. script is renamed from `detect_ignition_major_version.py` to `detect_cmake_major_version.py` and add support for gazebo and sdformat versions

1. add `_` to ignition regex to support `ignition-fuel_tools0` project name

Test builds:

* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/os_windows/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-windows7-amd64/13

* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/BuildCopFail/job/ignition_transport-ci-default-xenial-amd64/55

* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/BuildCopFail/job/ignition_transport-ci-ign-transport3-xenial-amd64/13

* :blue_circle: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/BuildCopFail/job/sdformat-ci-default-xenial-amd64/98/

* :yellow_heart: one flaky test failure https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/BuildCopFail/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/319

  1. script is renamed from detect_ignition_major_version.py to detect_cmake_major_version.py and add support for gazebo and sdformat versions

  2. add _ to ignition regex to support ignition-fuel_tools0 project name
